definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: A good actor must learn the art of tinting.
sentences.chinese: 要想當個好演員就要學會掌握道白的時間分寸。

sentences.english: His monologue stirred my inner anthropologist.
sentences.chinese: 他的這段道白激起了我的研究興趣。

sentences.english: A good actor must learn the art of timing, ie when to deliver a line most effectively.
sentences.chinese: 要想當個好演員就要學會掌握道白的時間分寸。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it

definition: in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
to blow (as of wind)/sound of wind/sough
